sentences.sContent: This gorgeous piece is our first attempt at building a very cool old style chandelier complete with crystals, but giving it quite a cutting edge look.
sentences.sContent_eng: This gorgeous piece is our first attempt at building a very cool old style chandelier complete with crystals, but giving it quite a cutting edge look.
sentences.sCn: 这款华丽的枝形吊灯让我们首次尝试采用非常沉稳的冷色系水晶，但我们赋予其相当时尚的外表。

trans.tranOther: a large round frame for holding  candle s  or lights that hangs from the ceiling and is decorated with small pieces of glass
